definition: selectively dissolve the surface of (a semiconductor or printed circuit) with a solvent, laser, or stream of electrons
details:
verb
- selectively dissolve the surface of (a semiconductor or printed circuit) with a solvent, laser, or stream of electrons
- carve or cut a design or letters into
= synonyms: engrave
- carve or cut into a block used for printing or print from such a block
= synonyms: engrave
- make an etching of
= example: make an etching of
- cause to stand out or be clearly defined or visible
= example: cause to stand out or be clearly defined or visible
